name: Worst Party Ever (Ludum Dare 46)
description:
Ludum Dare 46: Keep It Alive

You're hosting a party, but it's not going too well. You have 5 minutes to keep the party alive.

Talk to guests to give them a little hype boost and get a random clue about their music taste.

Use your phone to post on Clucker and invite new guests or change music with the Bluetooth Speaker app.

Some guests are looking for love. They'll be disappointed if there aren't enough available people.
